code: import*as actionTypes from"../actions/actionTypes";const INITIAL_STATE={currentTheme:"light"};const systemReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:INITIAL_STATE;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;const{type,payLoad}=action;switch(type){case actionTypes.SET_CURRENT_THEME:return{...state,currentTheme:payLoad};default:return{...state};}};export default systemReducer;
